title: Estimating Matrix Rank With Neural Networks
description: This tongue in cheek work is about identifying matrix ranks from images, plugging in a convolutional neural network where it is absolutely inaproppriate to use. The paper "Visually Identifying Rank" is available here: http://www.oneweirdkerneltrick.com/rank.pdf David Fouhey's website is available here: http://www.cs.cmu.edu/~dfouhey/ The machine learning calculator is available here: http://armlessjohn404.github.io/calcuMLator/ The paper "Separable Subsurface Scattering" is available here: https://users.cg.tuwien.ac.at/zsolnai/gfx/separable-subsurface-scattering-with-activision-blizzard/
